pages.text: The combination of obsidian with $(l:resources/runestone)runestone$() has created a potent substance: $(l:resources/runed_obsidian)runed obsidian$(). The brilliance of lapis has been darkened by the obsidian, and out of it can be crafted wondrous tools and weapons.$(br2)Like $(l:apparatus/living_tools)living$() and $(l:apparatus/terrastone_tooles)terrastone tools$(), these are malleable enough to repair any damage they sustain.$(br2)$(info) It has the effectiveness of a diamond tool, and can be manually repaired with runed obsidian.
This hammer will mine in a 3x3 area.
This shovel will dig in a 3x3 area.
This hoe will till in a 3x3 area, and all ground tilled by it will be moisturized instantly.
While fast and low on damage, this dagger has a chance to cause enemies struck by it to bleed. Subsequent strikes have a chance to worsen the bleed.
